name: Bugs Bunny & Lola Bunny: Operation Carrot Patch
summary: Here's a nasty surprise for Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny: their carrot patch is empty! Whose footprints are these? Could Daffy Duck, Elmer Fudd, Yosemite Sam, Marvin the Martian, and the Tasmanian Devil have something to do with it? You can bet your crunchy carrots they do!!
